007package violajones_utils;
008
009import ij.IJ;
010import ij.ImagePlus;
011import ij.ImageStack;
012import ij.gui.Overlay;
013import ij.gui.Roi;
014import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.GuiTools;
018import imagingbook.core.plugin.JavaDocHelp;
019import imagingbook.violajones.data.HaarTrainingSet;
020import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeatureNode;
021import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeaturePatch;
022import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeatureTree;
023import imagingbook.violajones.lib.HaarCascadeDescriptor;
024import imagingbook.violajones.lib.Stage;
025
026import java.awt.Color;
027import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
028import java.io.InputStream;
029import java.util.List;
030
031/**
032 * ImageJ plugin. Visualizes the evaluation sequence for the selected Haar cascade. The current image is scaled to the
033 * size of the cascade (typ. 32x32) and shown in the background. The result is an image stack, with one slice for
034 * classifier each decision step.
035 * Feature support regions are shown as vector overlays.
036 *
037 * @author WB
038 */
039public class Visualize_Haar_Cascade_Overlay implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
040        
041        static HaarTrainingSet desc = HaarTrainingSet.FrontalFaceAlt2;
042
043        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
044                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
045        }
046
047        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
048        
049                InputStream strm = desc.getStream();
050                if (strm == null) {
051                        IJ.log("could not open training set");
052                        return;
053                }
054                
055                HaarCascadeDescriptor cascade = HaarCascadeDescriptor.fromInputStream(strm);
056                int w = cascade.getWidth();
057                int h = cascade.getHeight();
058                
059                List<Stage> stages = cascade.getStages();
060                
061                // create and populate the stack
062                ImageStack stack = new ImageStack(w, h);
063                ImageProcessor sp1 = ip.resize(w, h);
064                
065                int stageCtr = 0;
066                for (Stage stage : stages) {
067                        int treeCtr = 0;
068                        for (FeatureTree tree : stage.getTrees()) {
069                                int featureCtr = 0;
070                                for (@SuppressWarnings("unused") 
071                                                FeatureNode feature : tree.getFeatures()) {
072                                        ImageProcessor sp = sp1; // duplicate needed?
073                                        stack.addSlice("Stage=" + stageCtr + " Tree=" + treeCtr + " Feat=" + featureCtr, sp);
074                                        featureCtr++;
075                                }
076                                treeCtr++;
077                        }
078                        stageCtr++;
079                }
080
081                // add overlay graphics
082                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
083                int sliceNo = 1;
084                for (Stage stage : stages) {
085                        for (FeatureTree tree : stage.getTrees()) {
086                                for (FeatureNode feature : tree.getFeatures()) {
087                                        for (FeaturePatch r : feature.getPatches()) {
088                                                Color col = (r.weight > 0) ? Color.green : Color.red;
089                                                Roi box = makeBoxRoi(r.x, r.y, r.width, r.height, col);
090                                                box.setPosition(sliceNo);
091                                                oly.add(box);
092                                        }
093                                        sliceNo++;
094                                }
095                        }
096                }
097                
098                ImagePlus stackim = new ImagePlus("Cascade", stack);
099                stackim.setOverlay(oly);
100                stackim.show();
101                GuiTools.zoomExact(stackim, 10);
102                
103        }
104        
105        private Roi makeBoxRoi(int u, int v, int width, int height, Color col) {
106                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
107                path.moveTo(u, v);
108                path.lineTo(u + width, v);
109                path.lineTo(u + width, v + height);
110                path.lineTo(u, v + height);
111                path.lineTo(u, v);
112                path.lineTo(u + width, v + height);
113                ShapeRoi box = new ShapeRoi(path);
114                box.setStrokeColor(col);
115                //box.setStrokeWidth(0.2);
116                return box;
117        }
118

149}
